com.nickeson.games.cardgames

Interface Deck

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StdDeck

    public interface Deck
    Title: Deck.java

    Project: Blackjack

    Description: An interface for a collection of Playing Cards (Deck) for use in various card games.

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

    Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies

    Since:
    May 27, 2016

    updates:

    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    nickeson

        Returns:
        the next Card in the Deck

      • getCard

        Card getCard(int deckLoc)
        remove Card from the Deck at 'deckLoc' and add to inUse pile
        Parameters:
        deckLoc - the location in the Deck from which to remove the Card
        Returns:
        the Card from the Deck at 'deckLoc'

      • getCard

        Card getCard(Card card)
        remove a specific Card from the Deck and add to inUse pile
        Parameters:
        card - the specific Card to get from the Deck
        Returns:
        the specific Card from the Deck

      • getDeck

        java.util.List<Card> getDeck()
        (Does not remove cards from the Deck or move to inUse or discards)
        Returns:
        a List of Cards in the Deck

      • getRandom

        Card getRandom()
        remove Card at random from the Deck and add to inUse pile
        Returns:
        a randomly drawn Card from the Deck

      • removeCard

        void removeCard(Card card)
        remove a specific Card from the Deck, inUse and discards piles
        Parameters:
        card - the specific Card to remove from the Deck

      • discard

        void discard(Card card)
        remove a specific Card from the Deck or inUse pile and add to discards pile
        Parameters:
        card - the card to put in the discards pile

      • addDiscards

        void addDiscards()
        add all Cards from discard pile to the Deck

        the number of Cards in the Deck
